document_data.name: Silnia
document_data.mainbody: '''Silnia''' was a fallen [[angel]] in the [[Labyrinth]] in the [[Northdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The gods condemned Silnia and seven other fallen angels to remain as stone statues in the depths of the Labyrinth for unknown crimes.
document_data.Powers: Silnia was tormented by terrible nightmares, which could affect other beings in the vicinity.
